ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Info for Bards from Patch Message.
ygData.msgSnippet: does make sense that it would be a sea zone, but isnt there also a bar in qeynos called Seafarer s tavern or something like that?   Hmmm maybe it will be
ygData.messageBody:
does make sense that it would be a sea zone, but isnt there also a bar in
qeynos called Seafarer's tavern or something like that? Hmmm maybe it will
be something like oh i dunno, an improved enduring breath song hehe. gotta
make our gloves like the rest of the SS armor: useless 8)

It is nice that they finally smartened up and got off their "works as
intended" routine and actually did something for us. Must be Absor's doing.

Sorry just being a pain in the butt, i forgot it was patch day and didnt get
my fix of eq this morning, that and well work, sucks like usual

Minkin
Sol Ro

P.S. Anyone out there looking for a Junior/intermidiate webmaster that could
work from home or willing to relocate hehe?



-----Original Message-----
From: Khelan [mailto:khelan@...]
Sent: November 29, 2000 8:44 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Info for Bards from Patch Message.


Found this burried in todays' Patch Message:

"- Bards of the land, hark unto me: The notes have been scribed on tattered
parchment, two score and nine, for you they are meant. Abandon your mates,
though they may fume, and follow the call of the seafarer's tune."

First thing that came to mind..."two score and nine" == 49.

Songs like we just got our 49th song, and they hid it in a quest or in a sea
zone (spell merchie on 'clops island in OOT comes to mind). Hope it's good!

--Khelan, bard of 45 songs somewhere on Tarew Marr

Heh, had a great time in MM last night, we got lucky, got 3 mm drums, 3
quest lutes, 1 real lute, 3 werewolf talons :)



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
